text: Yaqeenan tumharay maalon aur tumhari jaanon say tumhari aazmaish ki jaye gi aur yeh bhi yaqeen hai kay tumhen unn logon ki jo tum say pehlay kitab diye gaye aur mushrikon ki boht si dukh denay wali baaten bhi sunni paren gi aur agar tum sabar kerlo aur perhezgari ikhtiyar kero to yaqeenan yeh boht bari himmat ka kaam hai
